About the Listing Agent
Brian Brockman
Bang Realty, Inc.
(513) 995-7793
Contact Brian
Brian is one of a handful of real estate brokers and auctioneers who is licensed in all 50 states and the District of Columbia. Brian has over 15 years in asset management experience and has sold properties for investors, developers, and many local, national, and international financial institutions.
